data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample SEVEJUPI-341

Exposition S, Slope 45 deg, Geology: Gneis-Fels, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 25%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 20%, Moss cover 5%, Vegatation type: Trocken-saurer Förenwald über Gneisfels, Film number: 1104C
